alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 7:21PM MST until January 17 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST TUESDAY ABOVE 5500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 5500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 15 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 5500 feet near Buffalo Pass, Chinle, Ganado, Kayenta, Shonto and Window Rock. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 11 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes. Additional snow forecast from 7 PM Today to 11 PM Tuesday: Buffalo Pass 11 to 17 inches Chinle 1 to 2 inches Ganado 3 to 5 inches Kayenta T to 1 inch Shonto 2 to 4 inches Window Rock 4 to 6 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Consider changing travel plans. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau
